extendedInfo.description: Build the perfect deck to defeat your opponents in this fun turn based game! Set up winning combos and win the election!Use special powers such as Tea Party, Community Organizer and Alien Abduction to turn the tide when all looks lost!Prez Games, a deck building board game like you have never played before!Features:Two Player Pass & PlayHead to Head Online PlayComputer AI25 Political Candidates to choose fromThe goal in Prez Games is to be the first to win 270 electoral votes. Pick a Republican or Democratic side and prove who deserves the White House!Players manipulate the board with items from their campaign deck to set up winning board combos to win campaign cash and items..Win votes by surrounding states with your parties power (donkeys & elephants) in order to win the states votes.Each candidate possesses special powers that can be activated if the power requirement has been met. Knowing when to use a power is critical to success!Each player starts with 10 items , which differ based on the candidate selected. During play additional items can be won or purchased from the board and added to the campaign deck. A key strategy is building a well-balanced deck to ensure high value states can be won when they appear on the board.Use Bendibucks to unlock candidates. Bendibucks can be won by winning games, getting achievements or purchased.More characters added all the time!25 Playable Political Characters including:Barrack ObamaMitt RomneyHillary ClintonBill ClintonRonald ReaganRichard NixonRon PaulGeorge BushRoss PerotPaul RyanSarah PalinJimmy CarterJohn McCainRoss PerotDennis KucinichJohn KerryAl GoreJohn EdwardsJoe BidenMichelle BachmannHerman CainRich Santorum

reviews.title: Cool game. Ready for coming elections.
reviews.comment: Cool game. Gets better with practice.
reviews.author: Rob Marjerison

reviews.title: Really inventive game! I would buy the tabletop version of it!
reviews.comment: This is a great game! A really inventive use of deck building for board control. Overall a A+ title.
reviews.author: Jon Gilmour

reviews.title: Entertaining and Insightful
reviews.comment: Art and graphics are awesome on gs3. Lots to unlock. Makes you think and learn more than most games.
reviews.author: Jens Aafedt

reviews.title: Great game, plagued by bugs
reviews.comment: The game is fun, but every playthrough reveals new issues. Offline mode especially creates game breaking bugs, be prepared to force close constantly.  Would rate 5 stars if they fix the bugs.
reviews.author: Ben B

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Hard to choose from. I wish they had Rick Perry.
reviews.author: Jonathan Menjivar

reviews.title: Challenging multiplayer game
reviews.comment: Love the deck building and solo and multi play modes which works the brain and fun at the same time. Spent hours playing my friends got hooked
reviews.author: Owen West
